Articles.Content:
Something got wrong...

Harakiri Hill

Y'all know that you ain't gonna get any dill in da hill, ya know, why even bother. Da dill is not in da hill, or you ain't for da dill? A'ight, Let 'em catch ya.

\*clears throat\* what am I even doing here, proceed.
Dillless Hill
The Dilly Dillless HiIlly Billy Bill is stuck on top of the Dilly DiIlless Hilly Billy Hill!

Mine.

My Hill.

Thine. Thinecraft. Thine craft.

Thine Hill.

Tank.

My hill.
~~E~~ **Edited October 19, 2021 by ShuttlePilot**
eHill

I remove the E and replace it with a b.

bHill

Bhill called Bill to chill on hill, with no more dill, he ate his fill, now needs a pill, cause he feels ill, hope he don't spill, dill over hill, but chances are, you know he will, time to be still, just sit and chill, write thoughts with quill, on **BILL CHILL HILL.**

I'm just gonna show up and put a lawn chair on the hill. Y'all are welcome to join!

Our Hill!

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, AtomicTech said:
> 
> 
> I'm just gonna show up and put a lawn chair on the hill. Y'all are welcome to join!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Our Hill!
> 

![Communist_Bugs_Bunny_Banner.jpg](https://i.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/034/467/Communist_Bugs_Bunny_Banner.jpg)

i start war to stop the spread of communism and win my hill

The proper Soviet ~~Bunny~~ Hare comes in.

![ca8406cbeeb391ba42df37cbcc2fae4b.webp](https://s2.cdn.teleprogramma.pro/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/webp_l/ca8406cbeeb391ba42df37cbcc2fae4b.webp)

Hare Hill

The protagonist from *Really Really Really Tall Building* falls from Floor 2371 and lands on the Hare Hill, demolishing it. 

It's a crater hill?

See you later crater.

It's a no Hare Care Hill.

The crater brings a crate and founds a krait inside.

Krait Hill

What's a Krait Hill? Do you mean Kraid?

Super Metroid Hill

Suddenly the ground erupts violently, spewing lava till it forms a new hill.

**Krakatoa Hill.**

I get fire truck-tank.

My hill.

(that would be cool)

> 
> 
> 3 minutes ago, Admiral Fluffy said:
> 
> 
> (that would be cool)
> 

Well, put those drawing skills to use and make one for us to see.
A great earthquake emrges and lava spews out creating a hill larger than mount everest. The Tall Hill is born!

The orthography of The Tall Hill has changed.

Thetall Hill

A giant Thesaurus swoops down on it's massive wings and let's out a mighty roar, cowing all challengers.

**THESAURUS HILL.**

I construct indestructible shield around hill with infinite life support and no entrances or exits.

it also has a time stopping device to prevent temporal shenanigans and to stop me from aging  or being killed.

my hill

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-21T13:55:35Z" title="10/21/2021 01:55  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 21, 2021</time> by asap1**
